resources.string:
Hi my name is Ngonidzashe. 
John is a software developer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications. 
He has a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of California, Los Angeles. 
John is passionate about creating clean and efficient code and enjoys working on projects that challenge him. 
During his career, John has worked on a variety of projects, ranging from small startups to large enterprise-level applications. 
He is skilled in using technologies such as Node.js, React, and MongoDB, and is always eager to learn new technologies. 
John is a team player and enjoys collaborating with other developers and stakeholders to ensure that projects are delivered on time and to the highest standard. 
In his spare time, he enjoys playing basketball and hiking in the mountains.
